settings.title: History of Pacific Fitness, Inc.
settings.content:
Peter Oh founded Pacific Fitness, Inc. in 1995 opening his first showroom in the Sherman Oaks Galleria Mall in Los Angeles, CA. Operating as a "one man band" Peter delivered equipment in the morning, opened the showroom by 10:00 a.m., and then delivered equipment in the evening.

In 1996, Peter decided to take advantage of the opportunities a growing Las Vegas market had to offer and opened the first showroom. During the past 28 years Pacific Fitness, Inc. has grown into three showrooms supported by an in-house service and installation team.

Pacific Fitness, Inc. is dedicated to high standards of excellence and quality. These standards are reflected in our industry leading manufacturers, professional sales team, and exceptional service team.
